Contributor: U.S. Army Engineer Reproduction Plant, publisher.;
Note: Initials "L" and "H" appear on bottom. "1090-1" appears on bottom right of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to enlist in the engineers and become a soldier and a mechanic. Illustration shows the back of two men working, one wearing overalls and the other an army uniform.

Title: Which? soldier or mechanic
